text: George Loening Hickenlooper III (May 25, 1963 â€“ October 29, 2010) was an American documentary filmmaker and narrator. He made several documentary movies. Hickenlooper was born in St. Louis, Missouri. He died from an accidental painkiller overdose. Sleep apnea was also a factor. He died in Denver, Colorado. == Other websites == * Category:Drug-related accidental deaths in the United States Category:Movie directors from Missouri Category:Movie producers from Missouri Category:Writers from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Screenwriters from Missouri Category:1963 births Category:2010 deaths
title: George Hickenlooper
